title: Ich habe outlook; komme aber nicht mehr rein!
content:

Seit gestern sagt mir mein Laptop, ich müsse mich mit Kennwort anmelden. Das ist GANZ NEU! und ich weiss nicht welches, das Letzte Passwort wird nicht akzeptiert! Was kann ich noch tun. Ich kann meine mails nicht mehr lesen/beantworten VIELEN DANK

HILFE HILFE HILFE

title: NON RIESCO A SCARICARE POSTA
content:
Dopo l'ultimo aggiornamento di Mozilla Thunderbird non riesco a scaricare o cancellare i messaggi di posta mi esce questo messaggio :

Impossibile scrivere il messaggio nella cartella di posta. Controllare di possedere i permessi di scrittura nel file system e di avere spazio sufficiente per copiare la cartella di posta.

Ne ho assoluta necessita' . Grazie mille

p.s.: ho tanto spazio in memoria
creator: massimo.smaldone

title: Mailing in Thunderbird
content:
Waarom krijg ik altijd een foutbericht (ongeacht welke account ik gebruik) wanneer ik in Thunderbird een bericht naar meer dan 5 adressen wens te sturen. Ik heb gewoon een Reply all gedaan, dus niets veranderd aan de mailadressen. Boodschap is: "Verzenden van het bericht is mislukt. Er is een fout opgetreden bij het verzenden van e-mail. De mailserver antwoordde: Requested mail action not taken: mailbox unavailable Failure sending mail. Try again later 0Le6bC-1v5XA30L1g-00f0H6. 

Controleer de berichtontvanger ‘cor.***@gmail.com’ en probeer het opnieuw."
creator: jbourgeois679

title: kan geen emals versturen

title: MAIL NON FUNZIONANTE

creator: info11892

title: Cannot log into Outlook, OAuth2 enabled, Appears to be IP addr related
content: Im running Thunderbird and can no longer log into my Outlook.com email. I have the OAuth2 server protocol enabled and its been working fine for ages, but over the last week or so has increasingly failed to login. It finds the server but hangs on login, finally after a minute or so returning "Authentication failure while connecting to server outlook.office365.com". I have not made any changes to the settings. Logging into Outlook via my web browser works fine. And here's the weird thing- enabling my VPN to change my IP to another nearby OR disconnecting from my wifi and instead hot-spotting from my 4G mobile phone, which also changes the IP- the login works fine again. Seems Microsoft have for some reason blocked my Thunderbird login at my home IP from their server end- a Real pain in the ass. I cannot find any info what to do online- how to reconfigure Thunderbird or contact Microsoft. Help!
creator: nz_flyboy1

title: drag-and-drop of attachments and inline stopped working since update
content:
I'm running Thunderbird 128.11esr in Kinux Manjaro (all up to date) and since I updated to 126 the drag-and-drop feature for adding attachments or pictures has stopped working:

It acts as if the attachment is there, but the file icon is greyed and with a ?, the file size is 0 bytes, and if trying to send or save as a draft, I get the message: "Please check that you have access to the file".

I installed this version through Flatpak, since I had problems with the version from the official repository.

Any help much welcome!
creator: ditaviz
